mapper.update:
update admin_check_com
com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
admin_check_com_status = #{adminCheckComStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
admin_check_com_time = #{adminCheckComTime,jdbcType=DATE},
admin_check_com_prepare_a = #{adminCheckComPrepareA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_check_com_prepare_b = #{adminCheckComPrepareB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where admin_check_com_id = #{adminCheckComId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update admin_check_com set com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_check_com_status = #{adminCheckComStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_check_com_time = #{adminCheckComTime,jdbcType=DATE}, admin_check_com_prepare_a = #{adminCheckComPrepareA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_check_com_prepare_b = #{adminCheckComPrepareB,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_check_com_id = #{adminCheckComId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT com_email As comEmail, com_create_date As comCreateDate, com_name As comName, com_inter_addr As comInterAddr, com_city As comCity, com_field As comField, com_scale As comScale, com_deplo As comDeplo, com_introduce As comIntroduce, com_founder_name As comFounderName, com_label_one As comLabelOne, com_label_two As comLabelTwo, com_label_three As comLabelThree from company As c, com_message As c1, com_introduce As c2, com_create_team As c3, com_label As c4 where c.com_id = c1.com_id and c.com_id = c2.com_id and c.com_id = c3.com_id and c.com_id = c4.com_id and c.com_id = ${comId}

select admin_check_id, com_id, admin_check_com_status, admin_check_com_time, com_email, com_create_date, com_inter_addr, com_city, com_field, com_scale, com_deplo, com_introduce, com_founder_name, com_label_one, com_label_two, com_label_three from admin_check_com As acc, company As c, com_message As c1, com_introduce As c2, com_create_team As c3, com_label As c4 where acc.com_id = c.com_id, c.com_id = c1.com_id and c.com_id = c2.com_id and c.com_id = c3.com_id and c.com_id = c4.com_id
